channel.title: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers
channel.description:
Anybody know alot about the Acoustic guitars to know if something is worth how much an seller on Ebay is charging? I have been looking around for about 2 months, and found a nice looking one on Ebay, i just need someone to tell me if its worth it. (contact via MSN if you wanna get to me immediately, otherwise posting here might take a lil)
kenshin1388@hotmail.com

item.title: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

For $200 you can still get a pretty nice acoustic guitar for begging. When I was at GuitarCenter I played a $150 Ephiphone Acoustic that played better than a $450 Martin. You just have to look around.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers

item.title: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

ziplock:

Doesn’t give too many details. I would be skeptical.

Decided I’m going to just give it more time and do more research, so I understand more of what I’m looking at when buying a guitar, so I can’t be ripped off so easily.

Read full topic

@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

I wouldn’t recommend buying online, go to your nearest music store and take a look around, they should help you choose the best option for a decent price.

item.title: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Ironic because i was there today, and was looking at one very close to that. Was $50 less though. I’m not looking for an guitar to know how to play right off, as I’ve barely touched one. I’m looking for a cheap starter set that is a decent guitar. Here is a picture of the one I’m currently looking at:

sky57.jpg600×780

Read full topic
item.source: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers

item.title: Getting an Acoustic, need some pointers
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

It’s always best to test out the guitar before you buy it. There are many aspects you need to examine in a guitar before purchasing. I don’t have any acoustic guitars, but I’ve been saving money up for one. I recommend going to a guitar center and in their acoustic room you can grab anyone you want and start playing it to see if you like it. My friend has this guitar “http://www.guitarcenter.com/Ibanez-AEL10E-Acoustic-Electric-Guitar-with-Onboard-Tuner-103367215-i1150893.gc” and he let me borrow it for a week and it was amazing, the neck glided right trough my hands and it sounded so smooth. So I’m probably going to purchase this one in the future.

Read full topic
